definitions.definition: A person who has severely impaired physical abilities because of deformation , injury , or amputation of parts of the body.
examples: He returned from war a cripple .

definitions.definition: A shortened wooden stud or brace used to construct the portion of a wall above a door or above and below a window .

definitions.label_groups: uncountable , dialect , Southern US except Louisiana

definitions.definition: A rocky shallow in a stream .

main_definition: ( offensive ) A person who has severely impaired physical abilities because of deformation , injury , or amputation of parts of the body.
secondary_definitions: A shortened wooden stud or brace used to construct the portion of a wall above a door or above and below a window .
( uncountable , dialect , Southern US except Louisiana ) Scrapple .
( among lumbermen ) A rocky shallow in a stream .
